org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster

Class ClusterPositionCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.ClusterPositionCorrection

  • public final class ClusterPositionCorrection
extends Object
    This uses the uncorrected cluster energy to correct the position of the cluster. This should be used before the energy is corrected on the Cluster and after cluster-track matching.

      • calculateCorrectedPosition

        public static double[] calculateCorrectedPosition(Cluster cluster)

      • setCorrectedPosition

        public static void setCorrectedPosition(BaseCluster cluster)

      • computeCorrectedPosition

        private static double computeCorrectedPosition(int pdg,
                                               double xPos,
                                               double rawEnergy)
        Calculates position correction based on cluster raw energy, x calculated position, and particle type as per HPS Note 2014-001
        Parameters:
        pdg - Particle id as per PDG
        xCl - Calculated x centroid position of the cluster, uncorrected, at face
        rawEnergy - Raw energy of the cluster (sum of hits with shared hit distribution)
        Returns:
        the corrected x position

      • positionCorrection

        private static double positionCorrection(double xCl,
                                         double rawEnergy,
                                         double varA1,
                                         double varA2,
                                         double varB1,
                                         double varB2,
                                         double varB3)
        Calculates the position correction in cm using the raw energy and variables associated with the fit of the particle. Prodecure described in HPS Note 2014-001
        Parameters:
        xCl -
        rawEnergy -
        varA1 -
        varA2 -
        varA3 -
        varB1 -
        varB2 -
        varB3 -
        Returns:
        the cluster position correction
